data.actual_result: The chat window stops receiving any input from the user but the rest of the app still works.
data.expected_result: The window closes and you can continue to use the chat window
data.short_description: If you press the search icon 2 or more times fairly quickly and then press cancel you can no longer interact with any chat window.
data.steps_to_repro: - Press the search icon 2 or more times quite quickly before it loads up. - Press cancel
